name: Pirate Treasure Adventure
description:
Help our little pirate find the way to kill all zombies, unlock the treasure. Pirate boy have to collect all star coins to get three stars of each levels. Pirate Treasure have three worlds: Sea and Antarctic world with 30 levels for you to play.

To move the character,use one finger,first put finger in joy stick center,fast move finger the reverse direction which your intended.The character will move as your wish.
